DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pharmacokinetics , safety efficacy intravitreal insert fluocinolone acetonide treatment diabetic macular edema
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Efficacy Study Fluocinolone Acetonide Inserts Patients With Diabetic Macular Edema
